Reason: The 'verboseLog' configuration option is performance-sensitive. The reason for this classification is that the 'args.verboseLog' condition in the code snippet directly affects the execution flow by determining whether to print the log information or not. Printing log information can be time-expensive and memory-expensive, especially if the log is large or if it contains complex data structures. This can lead to notable performance variations at the system level, making the configuration performance-sensitive.
